label: Formulate
description: Analyze and deformulate product compositions based on specific requirements

defaultOutputs.name: Ingredient Name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Common or trade name of the ingredient (e.g. "Honey (standardized)", "Fructose", "Glucose").

defaultOutputs.name: INCI Name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: International Nomenclature of Cosmetic Ingredients (INCI) name, the standardized name used in cosmetic labeling.

defaultOutputs.name: CAS Number
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS) registry number, a unique identifier for the chemical substance. May be "N/A (natural mixture)" for complex natural products.

defaultOutputs.name: Concentration (%)
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Concentration of the ingredient in the formulation as a percentage (e.g. "65.0", "10.0", "q.s." for quantum satis).

defaultOutputs.name: Market
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Target market/region for the formulation (e.g. "US / EU").

defaultOutputs.name: Regulatory Status
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Regulatory compliance status: "Allowed", "Conditionally allowed", or other status.

defaultOutputs.name: Restriction Type
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Type of regulatory restriction: "None", "Flavoring (natural)", "Novel ingredient review", "Flavor / processing aid", "Acidity regulator", or other.

defaultOutputs.name: Max Allowed Concentration
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Maximum allowed concentration for the ingredient (e.g. "GMP" for Good Manufacturing Practice, "Low-level use only").

defaultOutputs.name: Reason
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Explanation for the regulatory status and usage (e.g. "Traditional food ingredient", "Common food sugar").

defaultOutputs.name: Regulation Source
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Source regulation or standard governing this ingredient (e.g. "FDA CFR Title 21 / EFSA Food Catalogue").

defaultOutputs.name: Last Regulation Update
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Year of the last update to the regulation (e.g. "2023", "2022").
